subject: Basketball
Newtown, Conn, Shooting (2012)
lead_paragraph: As the Rockets went to Madison Square Garden, Kevin McHale was wrestling with the death of his daughter, and Jeremy Lin was revisiting the primary site of last season’s heroics.
snippet: As the Rockets went to Madison Square Garden, Kevin McHale was wrestling with the death of his daughter, and Jeremy Lin was revisiting the primary site of last season’s heroics.
